version_description:
Improved
- Updated Watch App for watchOS 2. Photos appear on the watch much faster!

Fixed
- Saves some extra EXIF data that wasn't saving correctly before.
- Changed the fastest shutter speed available, which for some reason was only 1/100

Fixed
- For some reason the histogram was not working on some devices like the iPhone 5 and 4s, this should fix the problem.

New
- Support for iPhone X.

Are you enjoying taking photos with Reuk? I'd really appreciate it if you could write a review or leave a rating!

Don't forget to follow @ReukCam on Instagram and tag your photos with #ReukCam! You can also lik
